text: Ceye dekho! Tomara bhagini hete calechila, takhana se balale -- 'ami ki apanadera jan'ya dekhiye deba take ye era bhara nite pare?â€™â€™ Phale tomake amara phiriye dilama tomara mayera kache yena tara cokha juraya ara se yena paritapa na kare. Ara tumi ekati lokake mere phelechile, tarapara amara tomake manahpira theke ud'dhara karechilama, ara amara tomake pariksa karechilama bahu pariksaya. Erapara tumi bahu batsara abasthana karechile madiyanabasidera sange, tarapara, he musa, tumi sid'dhanta anuyayi ese paumchecha.
